resources.string: Early Language & Literacy and Numeracy Assessment
V01. Is there tarmac/all weather road leading to the village?
V02. Is there public transport available to the village?
V03. Does the village have access to electricity connection?
V04. Does the village have any government health center/hospital?
V05. Does the village have any private health clinic/hospital?
V06a. Does the village have any pre-primary schools or any school offering pre-primary grades/classes?
V06b. Which type of school(s) in the village offers pre-primary grades/classes?(Tick all that apply)
V07a. Does the village have any schools offering primary grades/classes?
V07b. Which type of school(s) in the village offers primary grades/classes?(Tick all that apply)
HHO1. Household number from the house listing format/Hamlet number *
HHO3. Name of the household head
HHO4a. Does the household have children (living regularly) in the age group 4-10 years?
HHO5. Telephone/Mobile number of the household (write only if available and willing to share)
HHO6a. Number of members regularly living in the household
HHO6b. Do you speak English at home?
HHO6c. How often do you speak English at home?
HHO6d. Do you speak any other language at home?
HHO7a. Does the household have finished roofing?
HHO7b. Does the household have finished walls?
HHO7c. What is the source of lighting regularly used in the household?
HHO7d1. Does the household have a regular source of drinking water within the compound?(the source can be inside the house or outside, but only the members of the household exclusively use it)
HHO7d2. Do you pay to access/use this source of water?
HHO7f. At least one toilet/latrine that is exclusively used by the members of the household?
HHO7g. At least one member (other than the child\'s parents) who has completed A-Level /holds an A-Level certificate/ high school diploma/hold a high school completion certificate?
HHO7h. Any children\'s books, or other suitable reading materials for children, like story books besides the school textbooks?
HHO7i. Any other books or reading materials, like religious textbooks, newspapers magazines etc?
HHO7p. How many wheels does it have?
CHO4a. Does [###] have any known disability?
CHO5. Is [###] currently enrolled in any school or preschool?
CHO6c. Is English the official medium of instruction in this school? (for younger children, perhaps you can check their school textbooks/worksheets/activity sheets to confirm)
CHO6f. Does [###] have textbooks for the current grade?
CHO6g. Has the [###] ever repeated a grade in school?
CHO7a. Was [###] ever enrolled in school?
CHO7d. What was the main reason [###] dropped out?
No school available nearby for the next grade
CHO9a. Does [###] currently take any paid tuition class (coaching)?
CHO9b. Has [###] brought home any materials to read (other than school textbooks) in the last 2 weeks from the school library or any other place?
CHO8a. Does anyone at home help the child with their homework?
CHO9c. How often does someone in the household read or tell stories to [###]?

(if mother is not alive or doesn’t live in the household, then leave PT01a to PT01f blank; however if the child lives with their step-mother, then consider her as the mother and fill PT01a to PT01f with her details)

(if father is not alive or doesn’t live in the household, then leave PT02a to PT02f blank; however is the child lives with their step-father, then consider his as the father and fill PT02a to PT02f with her details)
PTO1d. Upto what level of schooling has she completed?
PTO2d. Upto what level of schooling has he completed?
PTO1c. Has the mother ever attended school?
PTO2c. Has the father ever attended school?
PTO1e. Does the mother have an income generating work/job?
PTO2e. Does the father have an income generating work/job?
Agricultural or related work that is family/self owned
Agricultural or related work that is owned by someone else (includes government and others)
Non-agricultural work in a family/self owned enterprise
Non-agricultural work in an enterprise owned by someone else (includes government and others)
Do you want to Start Assessment?
Do you want to go to the next task?
Are you sure you want to exit?
Please Enter Mobile No. and Password!
Please select at least one field.
Household Number and Respondent names are Mandatory!
Mobile No. must be less than 20 digit.

string-array.name: school_type
string-array.item: Other (includes religious schools like madarasas, NGO operated schools and informal facilities)

string-array.name: student_dropoutclass
string-array.item: Last grade/class completed before dropping out
